directions.step:
8 oz cream cheese -- cubed 3/4 c grated Parmesan cheese 1 stick butter -- softened 1/2 c heavy cream 8 oz fettucine -- cooked & : drained 1/8 ts fresh grated nutmeg
In a large saucepan, stir together the cream cheese, parmesan, butter, and cream. Heat, stirring, until smooth. Add hot, cooked fettuccini, and toss until well covered. Serve immediately, sprinkled with nutmeg.
NOTES : Margarine, and milk can be substituted for the butter and cream for the weakat heart. Recipe By : General Foods
